Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Orchard Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Orchard Lane and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way runs north and south through the intersection with Orchard Lane, which continues to the east and west. The Brunskid Trader's Guild is located on the northeastern corner of the intersection and known for it not-so-legitimate dealings with goods of questionable origins. The Guild often gets raided, but they never find anything to shut them down.
